name: Suicide Hero
description:
You are a hero thrown into a dungeon. You were cursed to receive infinite experience in exchange for your life. Your only way to survive is to kill the enemies.

Credit:

Player/Enemies: https://0x72.itch.io/dungeontileset-ii

Tiles: https://safwyl.itch.io/16x16-dungeon-autotile-remix
